short_summary: The contract is for a Senior Business Consultant to provide strategic advice to DFSI in transforming financial processes and leveraging tools such as BI and BPC vital to delivering on the mandate to be a strategic partner, and integrator for Finance functions by enabling transformation and standardization through optimized business processes, tools, systems and people to provide proper oversight and acumen.
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for a Business Consultant (Senior) resource to provide strategic advice to DFSI in transforming financial processes and leveraging tools such as BI and BPC vital to delivering on the mandate to be a strategic partner, and integrator for Finance functions by enabling transformation and standardization through optimized business processes, tools, systems and people to provide proper oversight and acumen.
